title: Apple Women’s Health Study and Cycle Tracking app gains new insight into PCOS
content:
News is out today from the Apple Women’s Health Study on periods, Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS), and heart health. This study is done by the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences, and Apple. 

more…

The post Apple Women’s Health Study and Cycle Tracking app gains new insight into PCOS appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple Women’s Health Study and the Cycle Tracking app gain insight on periods, Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS), and heart health.
